_header: In a valley of this restless mind
_description: A Complaint of Christ — sixteen 8-line stanzas (ababbcbc) with the refrain, ‘Quia amore langueo’

CULHh412.First Lines:
In the valle of restles myndI sowght in mownteyn & in
                    mede…
CULHh412.Last Lines:
…thy mede is markyd whan thow art mortin blysse Quia amore
                        langueo
